notification.name: interfaceDown
notification.text-message: All services are down on interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel%. New Outage records have been created and service level availability calculations will be impacted until this outage is resolved.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% down.

notification.name: nodeDown
notification.text-message: All services are down on node %nodelabel%. New Outage records have been created and service level availability calculations will be impacted until this outage is resolved.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: node %nodelabel% down.

notification.name: nodeLostService
notification.text-message: The %service% service poll on interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% failed at %time%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %service% down on %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: nodeAdded
notification.text-message: OpenNMS has discovered a new node named %parm[nodelabel]%. Please be advised.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %parm[nodelabel]% discovered.

notification.name: interfaceDeleted
notification.text-message: Due to extended downtime or operator action, the interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% has been deleted from OpenNMS's polling database.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: [OpenNMS] %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% deleted.

notification.name: High Threshold
notification.description: A monitored device has hit a high threshold
notification.text-message: A Threshold has been exceeded on node: %nodelabel%, interface:%interface%. The parameter %parm[ds]% reached a value of %parm[value]% while the threshold is %parm[threshold]%. This alert will be rearmed when %parm[ds]% reaches %parm[rearm]%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: High Threshold for %parm[ds]% on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: Low Threshold
notification.description: A monitored device has hit a low threshold
notification.text-message: A Threshold has been exceeded on node: %nodelabel%, interface:%interface%. The parameter %parm[ds]% reached a value of %parm[value]% while the threshold is %parm[threshold]%. This alert will be rearmed when %parm[ds]% reaches %parm[rearm]%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Low Threshold for %parm[ds]% on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: Low Threshold Rearmed
notification.description: A monitored device has recovered from a low threshold
notification.text-message: A Threshold has returned to normal on node: %nodelabel%, interface:%interface%. The parameter %parm[ds]% reached a value of %parm[value]% with a rearm threshold of %parm[rearm]%. This threshold for this alert was %parm[threshold]%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Low Threshold Rearmed for %parm[ds]% on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: High Threshold Rearmed
notification.description: A monitored device has recovered from a high threshold
notification.text-message: A Threshold has returned to normal on node: %nodelabel%, interface:%interface%. The parameter %parm[ds]% reached a value of %parm[value]% with a rearm threshold of %parm[rearm]%. This threshold for this alert was %parm[threshold]%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: High Threshold Rearmed for %parm[ds]% on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: Disk full test
notification.description: Le disque est presque plein. OpenNMS a recu Alphalink/mteTriggerFired
notification.text-message: Le volume %parm[#6]% sur le disque en node: %nodelabel%, est plein! (%parm[#7]%)
notification.subject: Warning #%noticeid%: Un volume est plein sur %nodelabel%.

notification.name: Beaucoup des utilisateurs
notification.description: Le nombre des utilisateurs sur le node est excessive!
notification.text-message: Sur le node: %nodelabel%, il y a inhabituellement beaucoup des utilisateurs. (utilisateurs: %parm[value]%).
notification.subject: Warning #%noticeid%: Beaucoup des utilisateurs sur le %nodelabel%.

notification.name: Beaucoup des utilisateurs Rearmed
notification.description: Le nombre des utilisateurs sur le node est devenue normale
notification.text-message: Le nombre des utilisateurs sur %nodelabel% est devenue normal. (utilisateurs=%parm[value]%).
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Nombre des utilisateurs sur le %nodelabel% est devenue normale.

notification.name: Disque plein
notification.description: Le disque est presque plein.
notification.text-message: Le volume %parm[label]% sur le disque du node: %nodelabel%, est plein! Il est rempli a %parm[value]% percent.
notification.subject: Warning #%noticeid%: Un volume est plein sur %nodelabel%.

notification.name: Disque plein Rearmed
notification.description: Le disque est presque plein rearmed
notification.text-message: L'espace libre du volume %parm[label]% sur le disque du node: %nodelabel%, n'est plus critique. Il est rempli a %parm[value]% percent.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Un volume a plus d'espace libre sur %nodelabel%.

notification.name: Le disque se remplisse trop vite
notification.description: Le disque est presque plein.
notification.text-message: Le disque %parm[label]% sur le node: %nodelabel%, se remplisse trop vite!
notification.subject: Warning #%noticeid%: Le disque se remplisse trop vite sur le %nodelabel%.

notification.name: RAM insuffisante
notification.description: La memoire RAM est presque plein.
notification.text-message: La memoire RAM sur le node: %nodelabel%, est presque plein! Elle est remplise a %parm[value]% percents.
notification.subject: Warning #%noticeid%: La memoire RAM presque plein sur le %nodelabel%.

notification.name: RAM insuffisante Rearmed
notification.description: La memoire RAM se liberee.
notification.text-message: La memoire RAM sur le node: %nodelabel%, s'est liberee. Elle est remplise a %parm[value]% percents.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: La memoire RAM sur le %nodelabel% s'est liberee.

notification.name: Swap insuffisante
notification.description: La memoire Swap est presque plein.
notification.text-message: La memoire Swap sur le node: %nodelabel%, est presque plein! Il ne reste que %parm[value]% percents libre
notification.subject: Warning #%noticeid%: La memoire Swap presque plein sur le %nodelabel%.

notification.name: Swap insuffisante Rearmed
notification.description: L'espace Swap se liberee.
notification.text-message: L'espace Swap sur le node: %nodelabel%, s'est libere. Il reste %parm[value]% percents libre du Swap
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: L'espace Swap sur le %nodelabel% s'est libere.

notification.name: Load average important
notification.description: Load average important
notification.text-message: Load average sur le node le node: %nodelabel%, est important (%parm[value]%)
notification.subject: Warning #%noticeid%: Load average sur la machine %nodelabel% est important

notification.name: Load average important Rearmed
notification.description: Load average important
notification.text-message: Load average sur le node le node: %nodelabel%, est devenu normal (%parm[value]%)
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Load average sur la machine %nodelabel% est devenue normal

notification.name: Nombre des appels excesive
notification.description: Nombre des appels excesive
notification.text-message: Sur le node %nodelabel% le nombre des appels devienne sature (%parm[value]% appels) et il a depassee la limite de %parm[threshold]% appels.
notification.subject: Warning #%noticeid%: Sur le node %nodelabel% le nombre des appels est saturee

notification.name: nombre des appels excesive Rearmed
notification.description: Nombre des appels excesive rearmed
notification.text-message: Sur le node %nodelabel% le nombre des appels devienne normale (%parm[value]% appels).
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Sur le node %nodelabel% le nombre des appels est devenue normal

notification.name: ICMP latency
notification.description: La reponse du service ICMP
notification.text-message: Sur le node %nodelabel% la reponse de ICMP dure trop longtemps (%parm[value]% us).
notification.subject: Warning #%noticeid%: Sur le node %nodelabel% la reponse du service ICMP dure trop longtemps

notification.name: ICMP latency rearmed
notification.description: La reponse du service ICMP
notification.text-message: Sur le node %nodelabel% la reponse de ICMP dure trop longtemps (%parm[value]% us).
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Sur le node %nodelabel% la reponse du service ICMP est devenu normale
